events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will start processing it promptly.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords like software and developer present in the resume.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage the software engineer candidate's recruitment process.
The candidate successfully passed the initial screening, demonstrating relevant engineering skills and experience.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in moving forward with the technical interview stage.
We have successfully scheduled the technical interview for the engineering candidate to assess their programming skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated excellent problem-solving abilities and deep knowledge.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's fit within company culture and benefits expectations.
The HR interview was completed and the candidate appeared enthusiastic about the role and company values.
An offer has been formally proposed to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and start date for the software engineering position.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer, confirming their commitment to start as a software engineer next month.
The onboarding process has started, including access to systems, orientation sessions, and team introductions.
The hire has been successfully closed with all paperwork completed and the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team.
